short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get RSS feed URLs from a website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Get RSS is a powerful and user-friendly browser extension designed to help you easily extract and access RSS feed URLs from any website. With just a click, you can gather all available RSS feeds, making it simple to stay updated on your favorite content sources. Whether you're following news articles, blogs, or other online content, this extension streamlines the process of discovering and subscribing to RSS feeds.

Key features include:

Quick Access: Instantly retrieve RSS feed URLs from any webpage.

User-Friendly Interface: Enjoy a straightforward and intuitive design that makes it easy for everyone to use.

Clipboard Support: Easily copy RSS feed links to your clipboard for quick access.

Active Tab Functionality: Get feeds from the currently active tab without hassle.

Enhance your browsing experience and stay informed with Get RSS!
